projects.title: Game Card
projects.description: This is my main project. My motivation to continue to become a fullstack dev. It´s a gamecard from my hobby. I want to develop a PWA with VUE, to help on the game day where all argentine referee´s can work together.

projects.title: Faarg Landinpage
projects.description: A landing page to recruit new officials. At the time, the registration form is from Google but, I want to use the backend, so I am studying for it.

projects.title: Survey Page
projects.description: This is a simple survey page where I (need some fixes) use Javascript to validate the form data. Next, I want to use this page with the landing page and collect the data with Node JS or Python.

projects.title: Visa Login Page
projects.description: Responsive web for visa home. If you use your mobile to access your visa home, you will see that the web doesn´t adapt to small screens

projects.title: Florencia´s Portfolio
projects.description: One of the things I like to do while practicing web development is to replicate other sites and try to do the same. Then I think about what changes I can make to improve the web. Here is an example, first the Real Portfolio, and then comes mine with the changes

projects.title: La Cocina de Juan
projects.description: Practice project, especially to understand forms applied to reservations and online orders

projects.title: Vivero Aguacate
projects.description: Another Practice project, especially for responsive web design and e-commerce site. It has a cart and works with the localStorage. The e-commerce is from freecodecamp

projects.title: Amazon Library
projects.description: I try to replicate Amazon Prime web page. The trailer movies are displayed on a modal, they all work now!! (This was my first practice project)

projects.title: Gradient Generator
projects.description: I know there are pages to generate gradients, but I wanted to create one by myself, I wanted to challenge myself by creating my own code.
